long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You would like to know the opinion of users about your content, but manual processing is too long or not possible at all? 
We have a solution for you.
Graffer analyzes comments under your video by sentiment and produces a readable result.
At the moment, it is possible to display a general report, without detailing, but a new feature will be able soon, that will make it possible to request detailed report, where you can view the comments you are interested in by tone.

Just install the extension, open the video you are interested in, open the extension and press the "Start" button, the report will be available shortly.
